summary: Project to build an admin-managed system; next feature is an in-house admin Manage Listing dashboard to view and manage all retailer listings (create, edit price/inventory/status, disable, delete).
architectural_notes: Only main admin (in-house) manages retailers and listings; retailers do not have system access yet.

existing_features.title: Create a new Admin “Manage Listings” page that shows all listings grouped by retailer, displaying listing date, price (ZAR), and inventory status, with actions to edit, disable, delete, and create a new listing.
Add/extend React Query hooks needed for listing management to support the Manage Listings page UI (fetch all listings and perform update/delete mutations).

new_feature_requests.summary: Admin Manage Listing dashboard showing all listings per retailer with listing date, price, inventory status; allow create new listing, edit, delete, and disable (out of stock/emergency closure).
Extend the backend Listing model to include a listing creation timestamp so the admin UI can display a “listing date” for each listing.
Add backend admin-only APIs to manage listings: update listing price/stock/status, and delete a listing.

projectName: Add Admin Manage Listings dashboard (grouped by retailer) with create/edit/disable/delete
